channel.title: Technological Symbolism on The Cogitating Ceviche

item.title: The Spreadsheet as Sacred Text
item.description:
The Gospel According to ExcelEvery civilization has its scripture. The Mesopotamians had cuneiform. The medieval monks had illuminated manuscripts. We have spreadsheets.Open one and you can feel the reverence in its symmetry. The grid stretches out…

Read the full article on Substack
